name: Outer Space Scramble
description:
OUTER SPACE SCRAMBLE

Demo Ver. 

You are a BLASTRONAUT, sent on a misison to collect RARE ORBITAL CRYSTALS! Only one of your crew can get that space promotion though, so you better be the one that brings back the most ROCS!



Dodge Meteors! Escape UFOs! Blast Creeps! Have Fun?


Features
 

Pass & Play Multiplayer (1-4 Players)
1 Fully Playable Map (more on the way!)
Mini-Game Arcade

How to Play

   

  

   

Game & Art by Dan Enders
